title: Christmas Proposal
description: Chelsea Ross left her high school sweetheart, right after graduation. It was a decision she didn't regret until the day she finds out he's marrying the girl that she never got along with.She wants to spend time with her family for Christmas, but the thought of facing them has her torn. However, when her best friend Charlie comes to her with a proposal, it could be one that she can't resist. Will her heart find its way back to her ex? Or, will she learn that sometimes what you want isn't the same as what you need? Christmas is the time to believe in miracles and GOD always has a plan.
author: Cheryl Persons
